__e: I don't want him left alone for a second while all this stuff is going on here, okay?
Jane, my eldest daughter, who has not been well and is not looking her best.
But if you were to look at this thing straight just for a moment, you might see that there's something going on out there!
That something big was going on and she knew about it.
I mean, I knew something was going on, something that exceeded all of my training, but what I saw...
I'm told that Charles had no knowledge of the attack... until after we had already begun.
